name: Dice Warp
description:
Goal:

Move through the system and reach the jump gate

Movement:

First, place Dice from the dice pools into systems

You may view the potential encounter type in the event viewer window by selecting a node that is in travel range (Green circle)

Press "Lock in" to roll the dice (they cannot be moved after this)

Select a node(planet/asteroid) inside the green range

Press "Plot Course" to move towards the node (You must lock in dice before a course can be plotted)

When you arrive at the node the event viewer will show you the results of the event for that node

The dice will now be unlocked and can be moved again

You may not revisit nodes

Jump Gates:

When you reach a jump gate the "Jump" button becomes available

Pressing it takes you to a new sector

Ship Systems:

Each ship system has a level

Placing a dice in a system: When "lock in" is pressed the dice is rolled and the result added to the system level

Placing multiple dice in one system: The highest roll result is chosen

Events: 

Clicking a node in range will show you the type of event that will occur in the event viewer

On arrival at the node there will be a difficulty check

This check will be against your system level + the highest dice roll in that system

The event viewer will show you the result of this check

Stats:

Hull: A measure of your ships health, if it reaches 0 you die

Shields: A protective layer around the ship, these recharge based on your shield level+dice roll per move

Fuel: Moving to a node costs fuel which is reduced by fuel efficiency system. If you run out of fuel you fail

You may also burn a die by moving a die into the slot on the fuel bar and clicking the "Burn Luck" button, refilling your fuel but permanently removing the die
